entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
